title: How to delete new LoL beta client? Question not answer.
body: 1. I have been having a miserable time playing with the new client and it is quite and annoying time. I looked at a couple of posts and came across something that Targons Blade had said. He said the way to disable it was to first go to, C:\Riot Games\League of Legends-AIR ONLY\RADS\system, however there is no AIR ONLY in my settings. I ignored this and went on with the rest of the steps and finished. However when I reopened the client, the beta client was still there. anyone have any ideas.

replies.body:
Ohai~

If you want to delete the Beta entirely, you'll actually have to reinstall League completely using [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends). If you'd rather skip reinstalling the game entirely, you should be able to simply launch into the *Legacy Client* by hitting the button at the login screen, as shown below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

I hope this was helpful. Please let me know if you require additional help. ^.^
